result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Micheal J Karnes

records.addlTxt: Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services signed and filed.  bm
Order of Commitment for Treatment (Incompetency) signed and filed.  bm

Defendant Micheal J Karnes in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter appeared by video for Micheal J Karnes.  Attorney Jack Eichorst for Samuel Tufford in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case in court for Return on Doctor's Report.  Report of Dr. Seipel reviewed by the parties.  Dr. Seipel's report recommends in patient evaluation.  Parties do not contest.  Court orders Defendant  Court ordered defendant committed to the Department of Health and Family Services for Institutional Care in order to evaluate competency. 

Defendant is REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department for transportation to the designated facility.  Order of Commitment for evaluation signed and filed.  Court orders case adjourned for Return of Doctor's Report.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for January 24, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Cover Sheet for Confidential Records and Competency Report received and filed.  bm

Defendant Micheal J Karnes not in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter appeared by video for Micheal J Karnes.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.   Court date of 10/14/2022 for preliminary hearing is vacated.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Micheal J Karnes not in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. Defense Counsel did not appear and did not contact the court. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel received and filed.  bm
Notice of Retainer received and filed.  bm

Defendant Micheal J Karnes not in court, defendant in custody.  Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report received and filed.  bm

Defendant Micheal J Karnes not in court, defendant in custody. Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for preliminary hearing. States witness is present. OPD needs additional time to appoint an attorney. State requests that the matter be set for a State V. Lee hearing or status; denied. Court finds good CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Expert Testimony received and filed.  bm
No contact order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with TK, Elizabeth K., Or their family.

DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES THIS CASE WAS HEARD OFF THE RECORD:
Defendant Micheal J Karnes in court with attorney Joan Elizabeth Zawikowski.  Defendant Micheal J Karnes in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Micheal J Karnes appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
